new records: The introduction and documentation of previously unknown or unclassified specimens from a specific geographic area, often requiring formal descriptions and classification to be incorporated into existing taxonomic knowledge.

The discovery and documentation of previously unknown or unclassified entities, specifically in the realm of entomology, which expand our understanding of the natural world and contribute to the refinement of classification systems and geographic distribution records.
